data.name: Wobbledogs - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The official soundtrack for Wobbledogs, composed and produced by Sam Keohane (Mbrr).

Enjoy all the music from Wobbledogs anywhere you want in standard (MP3) and high quality (FLAC) format. Over 30 minutes of music carefully crafted to provide an optimal canine raising experience!
data.about_the_game:
The official soundtrack for Wobbledogs, composed and produced by Sam Keohane (Mbrr).

Enjoy all the music from Wobbledogs anywhere you want in standard (MP3) and high quality (FLAC) format. Over 30 minutes of music carefully crafted to provide an optimal canine raising experience!
data.short_description: Nine funny dog songs carefully crafted by Sam Keohane (Mbrr) to support an optimal canine raising experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 300 MB available space
